short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blackpink custom cursor for chrome. New browser experience with Blackpink Kpop cursor. Created for Blackpink fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New browsing experience by using this Blackpink custom cursor chrome extension. 
 
Blackpink Cursor Extension Features:

- Give you different Blackpink cursor design for you to replace default cursor.
- Allow you to select your preferred cursor sizes.
- Click on the task bar extension icon located at right hand top corner to open up Blackpink cursor setting box.
- Quick access to More cursor theme in setting box.

-------------------
! After installing this extension, refresh the previously opened tab if you want to use it on this page.

! According to the rules of the Chrome Web Store extension cannot work on the store pages and home page.
Please open any other website (for example, google.com) after installing this extension and check how the extension will work on it.

-------------------

If you have any questions about our Blackpink cursor extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you.
